[Y]AY-3-8912 Sound Internals
[W]Three channels, noise and envelopes.
[c][m.]
[W]The AY chip exposes tone periods,
[W]mixer controls, noise and envelopes
[W]for expressive audio.
[W]Smart channel allocation keeps effects
[W]clear without destroying your melody
[W]line.
[c][m.]
[G]- Tone channels A/B/C.
[G]- Noise for percussion.
[G]- Envelope shapes for movement.
[m][m-]
[Y]AUDIO TABLE
[C]Track register writes to debug stuck
[C]notes.
[c][m.]
